title: Bug Splats , league crash and more ..
body: Riot you client keep bug splatting me in game and in loading screen and I'm fairily pissed off rn because I I que'd up for a rank game and I accepted and my screen went black my league screen so it made me dodge champ select 2 times I was at 75lp now I'm at fucking 62 thanks riot way to go , you and you crappy game makes me wanna fucking quit , keep it up with this bullshit not being fixed game shity client all this shit and your gonna continue to lose more players Gg riot , this game makes me feel like Hearth stones better , now that's disappointing , 30 min fucking wait ban for this shitty game

replies.body: Getting a black screen like this suggests that something like a driver is failing to render the game, so you're still connected and can hear sounds.  You should go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix that up.  We can't alter game stats or [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), but happy to help troubleshoot.  HAving a queue for that long suggests a history of leaves so it's really important to get that fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
